## FieldMultilineInput.onHtmlInputKeyDown\_() method

Handle key down to the editor. Override the text input definition of this so as to not close the editor when enter is typed in.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected onHtmlInputKeyDown_(e: Event): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | Keyboard event. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
